comments:
Description: Smoke Test: NullPointerException is thrown out when open an 
existing report design file. Tested in 20050624 version.

Steps to reproduce:
1.Open an existing report design file.
2.NullPointerException is thrown out as follows,

If there is grid element in this report file, this error occurs. Drag a grid 
into layout, NPE is also thrown out.
The reason is the grid has some errors.  The next version has resolved.
